"says "original airdate 22 Jan 2010".."


Bullshit. This is the same movie that aired last year. Maybe they're re-airing it so folks can start the series from the beginning, but the statement above is incorrect and this episode is old-news.

According to the Sy Fy website it is an Extended Version of the one released on DVD last year, I assume it means thet they cut out some on the nudity and sex from the DVD version not suitable for broadcast on Sy Fy and have inserted other scenes to replace them.
It's 98% the same. I synced the sub and at a quick look, only some lines that existed in the previous version were removed or re-written. But only a maximum of 5-6.
